Devices > %2$s > Allow to connect > (check it) Save to Press again to exit Create Create folder Folder could not be created This permission allows ShareYou to read and write to your device's storage for receiving and sharing files. Settings This folder cannot be used Storage Share files The directory has been saved Search Change connection File name File size File type File status Details File explorer Create folder Choose folder Choose file You can not select the old folder Move files? You can move associated files completed and partly completed to this folder and this may take some time depending on the sizes New files have been received Show Preparing files Saving details Version Pending Running Interrupted Unknown Long ago Wi-Fi Direct Wi-Fi Bluetooth Ethernet Unknown connection Could not connect the device. Its address may have changed. Try reconnecting to the network while ShareYou is open. Choosing the best connection Retry receiving Ask Storage permission Permission to read phone state ShareYou needs to access your device's serial number to create a long-term identity number, helping other devices recognize you Emulated (%s) Not enough space Save path Removed Copy to clipboard ShareYou can share files now Tap to end session ETA %s Show files Set as Trust device Turn Trust on Turn Trust off Download Revise the text or press again to exit Save the text or press again to exit Update Save Just now ShareYou needs permission to set up a hotspot ShareYou hotspot Connect Disconnect You can send files directly via this open network created by a nearby ShareYou device. Connected devices may use your cellular data. You may want to turn it off. Skip Searching for ShareYou hotspot You can enable Wi-Fi to search for a ShareYou hotspot Enable Allow ShareYou to search and create hotspot Location Enable location service to see scan results and create hotspot Looking for devices over a ShareYou hotspot Stopping the ShareYou hotspot Starting the ShareYou hotspot Check Uncheck Preview & edit Uncheck items to remove them File root Please upgrade to a supported version, and rescan devices. @string/mesg_versionNotSupported Now communicating over the "%s" connection Got it To select a folder, tap its icon Connect to "%s" in "Wi-Fi settings" or send files via "%s" inside ShareYou Select all Select none Preview selections Connection with "%s" over "%s" failed Share will retry receiving interrupted transfers Please choose the connection method first Set up Location Save anyway Received size Transfer expired Save anyway? The sender does not know where the file is, but you can still save it File saved Sort by Sort order Biggest first ↑ Smallest first ↓ Name Date Size Worker service Task completed Deleting selected files Ongoing task Important notifications Low priority notifications Received %s in %s %d yr %d mth %d dy %d hr %d min %d sec No files here No photos here No apps here No videos here No songs in here Internal storage No result for "%s" The list will be refreshed whenever available Can not access "%s" Mount folder Select the folder you want to access Unmount folder %s (%s) Scan this code to share and connect devices Set up a hotspot so that others can connect to you Scan the QR code on the screen of the host device Rename multiple items Rename Rename Copy here Grid size Group by Photo Nothing Date Album Artist Folder Home Default Files You should add devices first Add devices Connect devices Share with other apps Set up hotspot Stop hotspot Scan this if both devices are on the same network To connect to devices, Wi-Fi should be turned on Completing The devices are not on the same network Camera permission required Add devices to transfer File No device added for this transfer - %1d of %2d Open Pause Retry No pending transfer left. To resume interrupted files, use 'Retry receiving' option. Your desired folder is not accessible. Files will be saved to the default folder. 
 
%s · All transfers appear here Transfers Use known devices Scan QR Code My QRCode @string/butn_startHotspot @string/butn_useExistingNetwork @string/butn_scanQrCode @string/butn_useKnownDevice Sent Send text Start By adding devices, ShareYou the same files with more devices. You will be taken back to the transfer when it is done. Downloads Documents Shortcuts Recent files Change save path Failed to receive some files Send @string/text_send Choose an option to connect to the other device. For instance, if the other device is showing a QR code, use Scan QR code option. Need a helping hand? Connection wizard Have you just set things up on the other device? Do you see a QR code (barcode) on its screen? Do you want the other device to connect to this device with hotspot (tethering)? If you don't know what hotspot is, tap to Yes. Do you want to use your router or any Wi-Fi network that you and your friend connected to? Do you want to access your previously contacted devices? Yes No Manage devices Wi-Fi won't turn on. Turning Wi-Fi on Turn on location service first to continue Connect to a Wi-Fi network to continue Removing… May take long Help @string/butn_help Choose Fix connection @string/butn_fixConnection The hotspot was started externally. To use QR code, you should start it here.
